TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ciku, title = Ciku, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciku} }

S.FORM: Ciku Itiniay i Hualien Cen no Hualien ko Ciku a niyaro', 2,828 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 6,794 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 58% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 3,939 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 42% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2,855 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 37%, Bunun 4%, Tayal 3%, Paiwan 2%, Truku 8%, Puyuma 1%, Sakizaya 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.

Ciko Itiniay i Hoalien Cen no Hoalien ko Ciko a niyaro', 2,828 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 6,794 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 58% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 3,939 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 42% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2,855 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 37%, Bonon 4%, Tayal 3%, Paiwan 2%, Troko 8%, Poyoma 1%, Sakizaya 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.
